response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your needs and endeavors. Given its exceptional value and quality, I am confident it will be an asset to you. Considering its worth to you is $10,000, I propose a fair offer of $9,500 for this item. This price allows you to acquire it at a slight discount while ensuring you receive a high-quality product that meets your expectations. Should you decide to proceed, please let me know, and we can finalize the transaction promptly.", "product_price": 9500}
